issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Note, the XML Data and XML Properties rows both return status code 200 but don't display anything on the page*

Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink in Firefox
2. Navigate to Platform > XHR > Binary Data

Actual result:
The console outputs a status code of 200 but the page hangs on "Downloading image..."

Expected result:
Image downloads successfully
fields.summary: MobileWeb : XHR - Firefox: In Kitchen Sink > Platform > XHR > Binary Data a status code of 200 is output to the console but the page hangs while displaying "Downloading image..."
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.8.201201262211
Ti Mob SDK 1.9.0.v20120209110134
Windows 7
Firefox 10.0

comments.body:
Occurs on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120920154617
Devices:
Kindle fire.
Note: 
Binary Data a status code of 200 is output to the console but the page hangs while displaying "Downloading image..."

Also occurs on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120921190208
Devices:
iPhone5 iOS-6
iPad3 iOS-6
Note: page hangs while displaying "Downloading image...".
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
